descriptions.accueil: FF8000 supports you in the design and optimization of your network infrastructures with solutions tailored for large enterprises.
descriptions.services: Discover FF8000's services: audit, design, automation, and training in network infrastructures.
descriptions.certifs: Proven expertise: CCDE, DevNet, AWS. Explore my certifications and network expertise.
descriptions.reference: Network projects and architectures designed by FF8000 for major enterprises and operators. High-performance, secure solutions tailored to complex needs.

accueil.description: FF8000 is a freelance consulting firm specialized in network and cloud architecture. We offer advanced expertise in the design, optimization, and automation of network infrastructures, providing high-performance and secure solutions tailored to large enterprises.

services.description: FF8000 offers audit, design, optimization, automation, and training services in network infrastructures. Our solutions are tailored to large enterprises and ensure performance, security, and simplified management.

offers.description: Professional network consulting services: audit, automation, optimization, and training

references.description: Network infrastructure project references delivered by FF8000.

itemListElement.name: Broadband International Backbone
itemListElement.description: Design of the BIB (Broadband International Backbone), a multi-VRF network with three security levels based on MPLSoFlexVPN technology.

itemListElement.name: Interministerial State Network
itemListElement.description: Redesign of a network with 15,000 remote sites and 200 VRFs including migration to Segment Routing and EVPN signaling.

itemListElement.name: Amplivia MPLS Network
itemListElement.description: Design of an MPLS network connecting 2500 sites using PPPoE, L2TP, and FlexVPN overlays.

itemListElement.name: INDUS v3
itemListElement.description: Micro-segmentation of 2000 multi-VRF sites to meet the requirements of a Vital Importance Operator (OIV).

references.title: Broadband International Backbone
references.description: Design of the BIB (Broadband International Backbone), a multi-VRF network with three security levels based on MPLSoFlexVPN technology.

references.title: Réseau Interministériel d'Etat
references.description:
Redesign of a network with 15,000 remote sites and 200 VRFs:
➩ Addition of a Juniper topology as a backup for the existing Cisco topology
➩ Migration of the transport layer (LDP/RSVP) to a Segment Routing network
➩ Migration of VPLS/tLDP services to EVPN signaling.

references.title: Amplivia
references.description:
Design of an MPLS network interconnecting 2,500 sites via multiple Layer 2 and Layer 3 access operators:
➩ Use of PPPoE, L2TP, and FlexVPN overlays for Radius integration and PE auto-configuration
➩ Design of the easyWAN application for generation of CPE configurations and Radius server interfacing.

references.title: INDUS v3
references.description:
Micro-segmentation of 2,000 multi-VRF remote sites to comply with the requirements of an Operator of Vital Importance (OIV).
Development of the application for route server configuration.

offers.title: Infrastructure Audit
offers.description: We evaluate your existing infrastructure against expected services, considering security, network lifecycle and sizing to highlight its strengths and weaknesses.

offers.title: Infrastructure Design
offers.description: We design high-performing complex networks that prioritize security, resilience, and operational simplicity.

offers.title: Automation
offers.description: Because automating a network isn't just about replicating a network expert in software, our approach starts with a well-adapted network architecture, followed by administrative and management data hierarchy, API creation, and finally application specification.

offers.title: Custom Training
offers.description:
We train your network teams in both theory (concepts and protocols) and practice (labs).
Our key expertise areas include: IPv6, QoS, Multicast, MPLS, EVPN, overlays.

domains.title: IP/MPLS Backbones
domains.description: For operators, we offer to implement a new generation of your backbone based on modern MPLS + Segment Routing technologies to deliver resilient L3VPN and L2VPN services with fast convergence.

domains.title: Enterprise Networks
domains.description:
For enterprises, we design resilient and high-performing networks:
➩ single or multi-VRF,
➩ with or without overlays,
➩ SD-WAN or native.

domains.title: Data Centers
domains.description:
We design your next data center using a modern architecture without spanning-tree:
➩ using virtual clusters (stack and vPC),
➩ in fabric mode.

domains.title: Cloud
domains.description: As an AWS-certified architect, we help you create your company's cloud environment and migrate applications securely and seamlessly.
